titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 187, 1 Present (Roll No. 91).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/1/1998--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from April 1 until April 21, 1998, and an adjournment or recess of the Senate from April 2, 3, 4, or 5 until April 20, 1998.
